  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(Player thePlayer, ArrayList<Monster> enemy)
      Instantiates a new battle.
      Parameters:
      thePlayer - the player of the game
      enemy - the Array List of Monsters that the player will battle

  • Method Details

    • fight

      public void fight()
      Fight. The Players team will "fight" the enemy team, until all Monsters in one team are killed (reach 0 health) At which stage the battle is either won or lost

    • awardWin

      public static void awardWin()
      Award win. If Players Monster team won the above battle, the awardWin method is called to increase the players gold and points. Prints the gold won by the player.

    • awardLoss

      public static void awardLoss()
      Award loss. If Players Monster team lost the above battle, the awardLoss method is called. Prints the loss of the battle.
